actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow unused benefits under cafeteria plans and flexible spending arrangements to be distributed.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit a cafeteria plan from failing to be treated as a cafeteria plan or flexible spending or similar arrangement solely because under such plan or other arrangement any nontaxable benefit which is unused as of the close of a taxable year may be distributed to the participant.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow unused benefits under cafeteria plans and flexible spending arrangements to be distributed.
